alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:35PM CDT until August 12 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southern Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Marion County in east Tennessee... Southern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/. * At 233 PM EDT/133 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gruetli-Laager to Sewanee to 6 miles south of Huntland, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Jasper, Soddy-Daisy, Signal Mountain, Rossville, South Pittsburg, Walden, Lakesite, Whitwell, and Kimball. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
